About V-F-C-F-C - AI Chat AI bot,

This bot is integrated with Barinshop and Open AI chat gpt Module.

Commands of Queen-AI,

â .pm-chatbot âª With this command you can enable or disable the Brainshop Inbox Chat Bot.

â .group-chatbot âª This command allows you to enable or disable the Brainshop Group Chat Bot.

â .gpt-pm-chatbot âª With this command you can enable or disable Gpt Inbox Chat Bot.

â .gpt-group-chatbot âª With this command you can enable or disable Gpt Group Chat Bot.

â .davinci-pm-chatbot âª With this command you can enable or disable Gpt Davinci Inbox Chat Bot.

â .davinci-group-chatbot âª With this command you can enable or disable Gpt Davinci Group Chat Bot.

â .botmode âª With this command you can run V-F-C-F-C - AI Chat Bot in both Public and Self modes.

â .mute-option âª This command allows you to mute the V-F-C-F-C - AI bot completely or only mute the bot on a particular chat.

â .set-presence âª With this command you can enable or disable the appearance of Typing on the bot's responses when the bot is running.

â .set-react âª With this command you can enable or disable auto-react to all messages.

â .power-setting âª With this command you can restart or disable the bot.

â .information âª This command can help you with the bot's source code and the bot project.
index_function.NOTE:
Note...

you can use all commands only in your log chat and type .setting-menu to get the main menu here.
